title: Do quarterbacks have an advantage when throwing indoors compared to outdoor stadiums?
text:
There are 10 indoor or domed stadiums in the NFL. One huge factor for playing indoor, is the wind or weather doesnâ€™t effect the quarterbacks. You feel me?


Code
library(nflfastR)
library(ggplot2)

pbp_data <- load_pbp(2024)

pbp_2024_pass <- pbp_data[pbp_data$play_type == "pass", ]

pbp_2024_pass_outdoor <- pbp_2024_pass[pbp_2024_pass$roof == "outdoors", ]

completion_rate <- aggregate(
  list(total_pass_attempts = pbp_2024_pass$play_type),
  by = list(roof = pbp_2024_pass$roof),
  FUN = length
)

completion_rate$total_completions <- sapply(
  completion_rate$roof,
  function(r) sum(pbp_2024_pass$complete_pass[pbp_2024_pass$roof == r] == 1, na.rm = TRUE)
)

completion_rate$completion_rate <- (completion_rate$total_completions / completion_rate$total_pass_attempts) * 100

ggplot(completion_rate, aes(x = roof, y = completion_rate, fill = roof)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(
    title = "Pass Completion Rate by Roof Type",
    x = "Roof Type",
    y = "Completion Rate (%)"
  ) +
  theme(
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "grey90"), 
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "grey90")   
  ) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("dome" = "blue", "outdoors" = "#006400", "closed" = "#8B0000"))

pbp_2024 <- load_pbp(2024)

pbp_2024_pass_wind_high <- subset(pbp_2024, play_type == "pass" & wind > 15)
pbp_2024_pass_wind_low <- subset(pbp_2024, play_type == "pass" & wind <= 15)

# Summarize data
completion_rate_wind_high <- data.frame(
  total_pass_attempts = nrow(pbp_2024_pass_wind_high),
  total_completions = sum(pbp_2024_pass_wind_high$complete_pass == 1, na.rm = TRUE)
)
completion_rate_wind_high$completion_rate <- (completion_rate_wind_high$total_completions / 
completion_rate_wind_high$total_pass_attempts) * 100

completion_rate_wind_low <- data.frame(
  total_pass_attempts = nrow(pbp_2024_pass_wind_low),
  total_completions = sum(pbp_2024_pass_wind_low$complete_pass == 1, na.rm = TRUE)
)
completion_rate_wind_low$completion_rate <- (completion_rate_wind_low$total_completions / 
completion_rate_wind_low$total_pass_attempts) * 100

# Combine results
completion_rate_wind_high$wind_condition <- "Wind > 15 mph"
completion_rate_wind_low$wind_condition <- "Wind <= 15 mph"
completion_rate_wind <- rbind(completion_rate_wind_high, completion_rate_wind_low)

# Waffle chart data
wi <- c("Attempts" = 688, "Completions" = 403)
nw <- c("Attempts" = 11962 / 100, "Completions" = 7269 / 100)
library(waffle)

# Plot waffle charts
waffle(
  wi, 
  rows = 25, 
  title = "Completions during windy days", 
  xlab = "1 square = 1 pass", 
  colors = c("black", "green")
)
